title: placelist: Your Personal AI Map
subtitle: Personalized space recommendations, LLM-based map service
description: placelist is the map version of ChatGPT, recommending spaces that match your context.
hero_subtitle:
placelist: AI-powered place recommendation service
that finds spaces through conversation without search
hero_description:
From dates, friend meetups, to alone time
We find the perfect space just for you
features_subtitle: A new experience different from existing map apps
feature_ai_desc: Learns your preferences and situation to provide accurate recommendations
feature_context_desc: Considers various factors like time, weather, mood, etc.
feature_simple_desc: Can be used immediately without complex settings
use_case_1_desc: Discover local restaurants and attractions like a local in your travel destination
use_case_2_desc: Get recommendations for perfect date locations considering your partner's preferences
use_case_3_desc: Find places that match your counterpart's personality and meeting purpose
video_subtitle: Create special appointments with AI-recommended optimal spaces
gallery_subtitle: Check out various spaces recommended by placelist
team_subtitle: Team creating the future of space exploration
team_desc: We are revolutionizing people's space exploration experience by combining AI and spatial data.
contact_desc: Please contact us through various methods such as user interviews, partnerships, and investment inquiries.
form_message_placeholder: Please freely write about what you want to discuss or any questions you have...
form_success_desc: We will contact you via email within 24 hours.
meeting_title: The best way to plan a meeting, placelist
meeting_description:
When users have appointments, AI recommends the best spaces based on location, atmosphere, and purpose.
For important meetings, days when you want to lift your mood, placelist makes appointments special.
innovation_title: placelist innovates existing space exploration methods
gallery_recommend_title: We recommend these kinds of spaces
creator_section_subheading: Sensational spaces, recommended directly by creator AI
creator_section_paragraph1: placelist collaborates with space creators to carefully select and recommend only sensational and trend-sensitive spaces.
creator_section_paragraph2: Each creator's AI agent finds the optimal place for you based on their unique vision and experience.
ai_understand_recommend_desc: For place recommendations, simple 'keywords' are not enough. placelist understands appointment purpose, time, location, and atmosphere to find the best space you'll like.
more_personalized_recommend: More personalized recommendations as you use it
more_personalized_recommend_desc: Start with one conversation and become more personalized. Learn from saved places, conversation history, and preferred styles to become your personal taste curator.
curated_spaces_only_desc: We don't recommend places that are just pretty. Based on space creator curation and user review data, we only select spaces that provide real 'good experiences'.
modern_cafe_desc: Cafe with warm atmosphere and sophisticated interior
modern_cafe_detail: Space for quiet conversations and alone time
dessert_cafe_desc: Sensational dessert space that captures both visual and taste
dessert_cafe_detail: Place to make special days even sweeter
atmospheric_bar_desc: Perfect evening space with lighting, music, and conversation
local_restaurant_desc: Real hidden gems only locals know best
local_restaurant_detail: For moments when you want to enjoy comfortably without burden
architectural_landmark_desc: Place with architectural charm where the space itself is inspiring
architectural_landmark_detail: Urban walking course that becomes special just by sightseeing
travel_destination_desc: That alley you found without a map, unexpectedly memorable place
travel_destination_detail: Space containing unexpected inspiration encountered in unfamiliar places
vacatio_vision_desc1: We innovate the way we consume space,
vacatio_vision_desc2: creating a world where every life becomes a journey.
creator_section_title:
Sensational spaces,
recommended directly by creator AI
